knimeNode.name: Fasta Writer
knimeNode.shortDescription: Writes a .FASTA sequence file from three columns

fullDescription.intro: This node saves sequence data in fasta format. Each annotated sequence becomes a separate FASTA entry. More information about the FASTA format can be found at wikipedia
fullDescription.option: Where to save the data to
Which column to use for the sequence data

ports.inPort: Input table include sequence column to be saved in FASTA format.
